mapper.insert: insert into ams_admin (username, password, nickname, avatar, phone, email, description, enable, last_login_ip, login_count) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{avatar}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{description}, #{enable}, #{lastLoginIp}, #{loginCount})
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, nickname, avatar, phone, email, description, enable, last_login_ip, login_count FROM ams_admin WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, username, password, nickname, avatar, phone, email, description, enable, last_login_ip, login_count FROM ams_admin ORDER BY enable desc, id
